invitation.heading: Permissions

None.title: Not invited
None.description: The member has no access to the organization and does not count as an active or invited member. Can be used in the org chart.

Readonly.title: Read only
Readonly.description: The member can only view the org chart without being able to modify it. Can view public meetings, topics, and tasks but cannot participate.

Member.title: Member
Member.description: The member can modify roles where they are leader, or edit everything if governance is not protected (see organization settings). Can participate in meetings, topics, and tasks.

Admin.title: Admin
Admin.description: The member can invite members and manage org chart sharing.

Owner.title: Owner
Owner.description: The member can manage subscription, appoint owners and admins, modify organization base roles, and edit the entire org chart even if governance is protected.

invitation.awaiting: Invitation sent to {{email}} on {{date}}, awaiting acceptance.

cancelSubscriptionModal.heading: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription?
cancelSubscriptionModal.desc1: This action will take effect at the end of the subscription period.
cancelSubscriptionModal.desc2: Your organization will only be able to have 5 invited members.
cancelSubscriptionModal.desc3: You will lose personalized support and priority support with our team.

invoiceTab.heading: Invoice history
invoiceTab.desc: Find all your past invoices here and download them.

SubscriptionInvoiceCalculationDetails.title: How is my invoice calculated?
SubscriptionInvoiceCalculationDetails.explaination: The amount of your invoice is calculated in the following way:
SubscriptionInvoiceCalculationDetails.desc1: Each active member (member associated to a Rolebase account) cost 5 euros per month
SubscriptionInvoiceCalculationDetails.desc2: If an active user is added during the month, the amount is prorated between the current date and the end of the billing cycle and will be added to your next invoice
SubscriptionInvoiceCalculationDetails.desc3: If an active user is deleted during the month, a credit note for the time spent during the month will be applied to your next invoice

SubscriptionReachedMemberLimitModal.title: Oops, you have reached the maximum number of members for your plan!
SubscriptionReachedMemberLimitModal.limitReached: You can upgrade your plan to increase the number of members in your team.

SubscriptionPlans.activateOnSubscriptionEnd: Will activate when current subscription ends

meetingSteps.Tour_desc: For a free discussion or a round table. You will be able to take notes.
meetingSteps.Threads_desc: To discuss Topics concerning the Role. Ideal for an agenda. You will be able to take notes for each chosen Topic.
meetingSteps.Checklist_desc: To review the Role's recurring actions. The Role's Checklist is automatically included in the note when the Meeting is created.
meetingSteps.Indicators_desc: To review the Role's indicators. The Role's Indicators are automatically included in the note when the Meeting is created.
meetingSteps.Tasks_desc: To review the Role's Tasks and prepare the next steps.
